p: The Mentha × piperita leaves and stems were collected from the region of Chiffa (Algeria). The botanical identification of the plant was made in Botany Laboratory of the Department of Biology, Badji Mokhtar-Annaba University. Leaves and stems were manually verified to move out any dried materials and debris. The extraction of the essential oil form was carried out on the fresh aerial part of the plant (stem and leaves). The extraction was processed using water vapor, after water boiling at 100°C, through an industrial scale of the “Extral-Bio ®” company producing organic essential oils and cosmetics, located in Chiffa (Blida, Algeria).
